info.title: Paylocity API

parameters.description: Type of Company Code. Common values costcenter1, costcenter2, costcenter3, deductions, earnings, taxes, paygrade, positions.
parameters.name: codeResource

get.description: Get All Company Codes for the selected company and resource

post.description: New Employee API sends new employee data directly to Web Pay. Companies who use the New Hire Template in Web Pay may require additional fields when hiring employees. New Employee API Requests will honor these required fields.

parameters.description: Number of records per page. Default value is 25.
parameters.name: pagesize

parameters.description: Page number to retrieve; page numbers are 0-based (so to get the first page of results, pass pagenumber=0). Default value is 0.
parameters.name: pagenumber

parameters.description: Whether to include the total record count in the header's X-Pcty-Total-Count property. Default value is true.
parameters.name: includetotalcount

get.description: Get All Employees API will return employee data currently available in Web Pay.
Get Employee API will return employee data currently available in Web Pay.

patch.description: Update Employee API will update existing employee data in WebPay.

put.description: Sends new or updated employee additional rates information directly to Web Pay.

get.description: Get All Earnings returns all earnings for the selected employee.

put.description: Add/Update Earning API sends new or updated employee earnings information directly to Web Pay.

get.description:
The company-specific Open API endpoint allows the client to GET an Open API document for the Paylocity API that is customized with company-specific resource schemas. These customized resource schemas define certain properties as enumerations of pre-defined values that correspond to the company's setup with Web Pay. The customized schemas also indicate which properties are required by the company within Web Pay.
To learn more about Open API, click [here](https://www.openapis.org/)

post.description: Obtain new client secret for Paylocity-issued client id. See Setup section for details.

Add new employee to Web Link will send partially completed or potentially erroneous new hire record to Web Link, where it can be corrected and competed by company administrator or authorized Paylocity Service Bureau employee.
post.operationId: Add new employee to Web Link
post.summary: Add new employee to Web Link

addClientSecret.description: The Add Client Secret Request Model

code.description: A value sent with the 'ACTION NEEDED: Web Link API Credentials Expiring Soon.' email notification.

changeReason.description: Not required. If populated, must match one of the system coded values available in the Additional Rates Change Reason drop down.

costCenter1.description: Not required. Valid values must match one of the system coded cost centers available in the Additional Rates Cost Center level 1 drop down. This cell must be in a text format.

costCenter2.description: Not required. Valid values must match one of the system coded cost centers available in the Additional Rates Cost Center level 2 drop down. This cell must be in a text format.

costCenter3.description: Not required. Valid values must match one of the system coded cost centers available in the Additional Rates Cost Center level 3 drop down. This cell must be in a text format.

endCheckDate.description: Not required. Must match one of the system coded check dates available in the Additional Rates End Check Date drop down. Common formats include *MM-DD-CCYY*, *CCYY-MM-DD*.

job.description: Not required. If populated, must match one of the system coded values available in the Additional Rates Job drop down.

rate.description: Required. Enter dollar amount that corresponds to the Per selection.

rateCode.description: Required. If populated, must match one of the system coded values available in the Additional Rates Rate Code drop down.

ratePer.description: Required. Valid values are HOUR or WEEK.

shift.description: Not required. If populated, must match one of the system coded values available in the Additional Rates Shift drop down.

benefitClass.description:
Benefit Class code. Values are configured in Web Pay Company > Setup > Benefits > Classes.
Max length: 30

benefitClassEffectiveDate.description: Date when Benefit Class takes effect. Common formats include *MM-DD-CCYY*, *CCYY-MM-DD*.

benefitSalaryEffectiveDate.description: Date when Benefit Salary takes effect. Common formats include *MM-DD-CCYY*, *CCYY-MM-DD*.

doNotApplyAdministrativePeriod.description: Applicable only for HR Enhanced clients and Benefit Classes with ACA Employment Type of Full Time.

isMeasureAcaEligibility.description: Only valid for HR Enhanced clients and Benefit Classes that are ACA Employment Type of Full Time.

defaultValue.description: Specifies the default value of the custom field.

isRequired.description: Indicates whether the custom field is required.

values.description: A set of values that are applicable to the custom field.

agency.description:
Third-party agency associated with earning. Must match Company setup.
Max length: 10

amount.description:
Value that matches CalculationCode to add to gross wages. For percentage (%), enter whole number (10 = 10%).
Decimal(12,2)

annualMaximum.description:
Year to Date dollar amount not to be exceeded for an earning in the calendar year. Used only with company driven maximums.
Decimal(12,2)

calculationCode.description:
Defines how earnings are calculated. Common values are *% (percentage of gross), flat (flat dollar amount)*. Defaulted to the Company setup calcCode for earning.
Max length: 20

costCenter1.description:
Cost Center associated with earning. Must match Company setup.
Max length: 10

costCenter2.description:
Cost Center associated with earning. Must match Company setup.
Max length: 10

costCenter3.description:
Cost Center associated with earning. Must match Company setup.
Max length: 10

earningCode.description:
Earning code. Must match Company setup.
Max length: 10

effectiveDate.description: Date earning is active. Defaulted to run date or check date based on Company setup. Common formats are MM-DD-CCYY, CCYY-MM-DD.

endDate.description: Stop date of an earning. Common formats are MM-DD-CCYY, CCYY-MM-DD.

frequency.description:
Needed if earning is applied differently from the payroll frequency (one time earning for example).
Max length: 5

goal.description:
Dollar amount. The employee earning will stop when the goal amount is reached.
Decimal(12,2)

hoursOrUnits.description:
The value is used in conjunction with the Rate field. When entering Group Term Life Insurance (GTL), it should contain the full amount of the group term life insurance policy.
Decimal(12,2)

isSelfInsured.description: Used for ACA. If not entered, defaulted to Company earning setup.

jobCode.description:
Job code associated with earnings. Must match Company setup.
Max length: 20

miscellaneousInfo.description:
Information to print on the check stub if agency is set up for this earning.
Max length: 50

paidTowardsGoal.description:
Amount already paid to employee toward goal.
Decimal(12,2)

payPeriodMaximum.description:
Maximum amount of the earning on a single paycheck.
Decimal(12,2)

payPeriodMinimum.description:
Minimum amount of the earning on a single paycheck.
Decimal(12,2)

rate.description:
Rate is used in conjunction with the hoursOrUnits field.
Decimal(12,2)

rateCode.description:
Rate Code applies to additional pay rates entered for an employee. Must match Company setup.
Max length: 10

startDate.description: Start date of an earning based on payroll calendar. Common formats are MM-DD-CCYY, CCYY-MM-DD.

county.description: Country.  Must be a valid 3 character country code.  Common values are *USA* (United States), *CAN* (Canada).

email.description: Contact email.  Must be valid email address format.

homePhone.description: Contact Home Phone.  Valid phone format  *(###) #######* or *######-####* or *### ### ####* or *##########* or, if international, starts with *+#*, only spaces and digits allowed.

mobilePhone.description: Contact Mobile Phone.  Valid phone format  *(###) #######* or *######-####* or *### ### ####* or *##########* or, if international, starts with *+#*, only spaces and digits allowed.

pager.description: Contact Pager.  Valid phone format  *(###) #######* or *######-####* or *### ### ####* or *##########* or, if international, starts with *+#*, only spaces and digits allowed.

primaryPhone.description: Required. Contact primary phone type.  Must match Company setup.  Valid  values are H (Home), M (Mobile), P (Pager), W (Work)

priority.description: Required. Contact priority. Valid values are *P* (Primary) or *S* (Secondary).

relationship.description: Required. Contact relationship.  Must match Company setup.  Common values are Spouse, Mother, Father.

state.description: State or Province.  If U.S. address, must be valid 2 character state code.  Common values are *IL* (Illinois), *CA* (California).

workPhone.description: Contact Work Phone.  Valid phone format  *(###) #######* or *######-####* or *### ### ####* or *##########* or, if international, starts with *+#*, only spaces and digits allowed.

zip.description: Postal code.  If U.S. address, must be a valid zip code.

additionalDirectDeposit.description: Add up to 19 direct deposit accounts in addition to the main direct deposit account. IMPORTANT: A direct deposit update will remove ALL existing main and additional direct deposit information in WebPay and replace with information provided on the request. GET API will not return direct deposit data.

accountNumber.description:
Account number, entered without special characters and spaces.
Max length: 17

accountType.description:
Account type. Valid values are *C* (Checking), *S* (Saving), *P* (Pay Card).
Max length: 1

amount.description:
Amount value to be deposited to the account.
Decimal (12,2)

amountType.description:
Amount type to indicate the context of the amount. Common values are *F* (FLAT), *F-* (Net Minus), *P* (Percent).
Max length: 5

blockSpecial.description: Indicates if direct deposit should be blocked when special check types such as Bonus are processed.

isSkipPreNote.description: Indicates if account will not pre-note.

nameOnAccount.description:
Name on the bank account. Defaults to employee's name.
Max length: 30

preNoteDate.description: Date to end the pre-note of the account. Common formats include *MM-DD-CCYY*, *CCYY-MM-DD*.

routingNumber.description:
ABA Transit Routing Number, entered without dashes or spaces.
Max length: 9

changeReason.description: Not required. If populated, must match one of the system coded values available in the Additional Rates Change Reason drop down.

costCenter1.description: Not required. Valid values must match one of the system coded cost centers available in the Additional Rates Cost Center level 1 drop down. This cell must be in a text format.

costCenter2.description: Not required. Valid values must match one of the system coded cost centers available in the Additional Rates Cost Center level 2 drop down. This cell must be in a text format.

costCenter3.description: Not required. Valid values must match one of the system coded cost centers available in the Additional Rates Cost Center level 3 drop down. This cell must be in a text format.

endCheckDate.description: Not required. Must match one of the system coded check dates available in the Additional Rates End Check Date drop down. Common formats include *MM-DD-CCYY*, *CCYY-MM-DD*.

job.description: Not required. If populated, must match one of the system coded values available in the Additional Rates Job drop down.

rate.description: Required. Enter dollar amount that corresponds to the Per selection.

rateCode.description: Required. If populated, must match one of the system coded values available in the Additional Rates Rate Code drop down.

ratePer.description: Required. Valid values are HOUR or WEEK.

shift.description: Not required. If populated, must match one of the system coded values available in the Additional Rates Shift drop down.

benefitSetup.description: Add or update setup values used for employee benefits integration, insurance plan settings, and ACA reporting.

benefitClass.description:
Benefit Class code. Values are configured in Web Pay Company > Setup > Benefits > Classes.
Max length: 30

benefitClassEffectiveDate.description: Date when Benefit Class takes effect. Common formats include *MM-DD-CCYY*, *CCYY-MM-DD*.

benefitSalaryEffectiveDate.description: Date when Benefit Salary takes effect. Common formats include *MM-DD-CCYY*, *CCYY-MM-DD*.

doNotApplyAdministrativePeriod.description: Applicable only for HR Enhanced clients and Benefit Classes with ACA Employment Type of Full Time.

isMeasureAcaEligibility.description: Only valid for HR Enhanced clients and Benefit Classes that are ACA Employment Type of Full Time.

companyFEIN.description:
Company FEIN as defined in Web Pay, applicable with GET requests only.
Max length: 20

companyName.description:
Company name as defined in Web Pay, applicable with GET requests only.
Max length: 50

currency.description:
Employee is paid in this currency.
Max length: 30

customBooleanFields.description: Up to 8 custom fields of boolean (checkbox) type value.

category.description: The custom field category.  Acceptable value is 'PayrollAndHR'.

label.description: The custom field label whose value is to be added/updated. Must match to the label defined in Web Pay Custom Fields setup.  Max length: 255.

customDateFields.description: Up to 8 custom fields of the date type value.

category.description: The custom field category.  Acceptable value is 'PayrollAndHR'.

label.description: The custom field label whose value is to be added/updated.  Must match to the label defined in Web Pay Custom Fields setup.  Max length: 255.

value.description: The custom date field value.  Common formats include MM-DD-CCYY, CCYY-MM-DD.

customDropDownFields.description: Up to 8 custom fields of the dropdown type value.

category.description: The custom field category.  Acceptable value is 'PayrollAndHR'.

label.description: The custom field label whose value is to be added/updated.  Must match to the label defined in Web Pay Custom Fields setup.  Max length: 255.

value.description: The custom dropdown field value.  Values are configured in Web Pay Company > Setup > List Values > Lookup Values > Custom Fields: PayrollAndHR.  Max length: 10.

customNumberFields.description: Up to 8 custom fields of numeric type value.

category.description: The custom field category.  Acceptable value is 'PayrollAndHR'.

label.description: The custom field label whose value is to be added/updated.  Must match to the label defined in Web Pay Custom Fields setup.  Max length: 255.

value.description: The custom number field value.  Decimal (18,6).

customTextFields.description: Up to 8 custom fields of text type value.

category.description: The custom field category.  Acceptable value is 'PayrollAndHR'.

label.description: The custom field label whose value is to be added/updated.  Must match to the label defined in Web Pay Custom Fields setup.  Max length: 255.

value.description: The custom text field value.  Max length: 255.

departmentPosition.description: Add or update home department cost center, position, supervisor, reviewer, employment type, EEO class, pay settings, and union information.

changeReason.description:
Employee department/position change reason. Must match Company setup.
Max length: 15

clockBadgeNumber.description:
Employee clock badge number. Defaults to employeeId.
Max length: 10

costCenter1.description:
Employer defined location, like *branch, division, department*, etc. Must match Company setup.
Max length: 10

costCenter2.description:
Employer defined location, like *branch, division, department*, etc. Must match Company setup.
Max length: 10

costCenter3.description:
Employer defined location, like *branch, division, department*, etc. Must match Company setup.
Max length: 10

effectiveDate.description: The date the position takes effect. Common formats include *MM-DD-CCYY*, *CCYY-MM-DD*.

employeeType.description:
Employee current employment type. Common values *RFT (Regular Full Time), RPT (Regular Part Time), SNL (Seasonal), TFT (Temporary Full Time), TPT (Temporary Part Time)*.
Max length: 10

equalEmploymentOpportunityClass.description:
Values are configured in Company > Setup > HR > EEO Classes.
Max length: 10

isMinimumWageExempt.description: Indicates if employee is exempt from minimum wage.

isOvertimeExempt.description: Indicates if employee is exempt from overtime.

isSupervisorReviewer.description: Indicates if employee is a supervisor or reviewer.

isUnionDuesCollected.description: Indicates if union dues are collected.

isUnionInitiationCollected.description: Indicates if initiations fees are collected.

payGroup.description:
Employee pay group. Must match Company setup.
Max length: 20

positionCode.description:
Employee position code. Must match Company setup.
Max length: 20

reviewerEmployeeId.description:
Employee id of the reviewer.
Max length: 10

supervisorCompanyNumber.description:
Supervisor's company number. Defaults to employee company number.
Max length: 9

unionAffiliationDate.description: Employee union affiliation effective date. Common formats include *MM-DD-CCYY*, *CCYY-MM-DD*.

unionCode.description:
Employee union code. Must match Company setup.
Max length: 10

unionPosition.description:
Employee union position. Must match Company setup.
Max length: 30

workersCompensation.description:
Employee worker compensation code. Must match Company setup.
Max length: 10

disabilityDescription.description: Indicates if employee has disability status.

county.description: Country.  Must be a valid 3 character country code.  Common values are *USA* (United States), *CAN* (Canada).

email.description: Contact email.  Must be valid email address format.

homePhone.description: Contact Home Phone.  Valid phone format  *(###) #######* or *######-####* or *### ### ####* or *##########* or, if international, starts with *+#*, only spaces and digits allowed.

mobilePhone.description: Contact Mobile Phone.  Valid phone format  *(###) #######* or *######-####* or *### ### ####* or *##########* or, if international, starts with *+#*, only spaces and digits allowed.

pager.description: Contact Pager.  Valid phone format  *(###) #######* or *######-####* or *### ### ####* or *##########* or, if international, starts with *+#*, only spaces and digits allowed.

primaryPhone.description: Required. Contact primary phone type.  Must match Company setup.  Valid  values are H (Home), M (Mobile), P (Pager), W (Work)

priority.description: Required. Contact priority. Valid values are *P* (Primary) or *S* (Secondary).

relationship.description: Required. Contact relationship.  Must match Company setup.  Common values are Spouse, Mother, Father.

state.description: State or Province.  If U.S. address, must be valid 2 character state code.  Common values are *IL* (Illinois), *CA* (California).

workPhone.description: Contact Work Phone.  Valid phone format  *(###) #######* or *######-####* or *### ### ####* or *##########* or, if international, starts with *+#*, only spaces and digits allowed.

zip.description: Postal code.  If U.S. address, must be a valid zip code.

employeeId.description:
Leave blank to have Web Pay automatically assign the next available employee ID.
Max length: 10

federalTax.description: Add or update federal tax amount type (taxCalculationCode), amount or percentage, filing status, and exemptions.

deductionsAmount.description:
Box 4(b) on form W4 (year 2020 or later): Deductions amount.
Decimal (12,2)

dependentsAmount.description:
Box 3 on form W4 (year 2020 or later): Total dependents amount.
Decimal (12,2)

filingStatus.description:
Employee federal filing status. Common values are *S* (Single), *M* (Married).
Max length: 50

higherRate.description:
Box 2(c) on form W4 (year 2020 or later): Multiple Jobs or Spouse Works.
Boolean

otherIncomeAmount.description:
Box 4(a) on form W4 (year 2020 or later): Other income amount.
Decimal (12,2)

taxCalculationCode.description:
Tax calculation code. Common values are *F* (Flat), *P* (Percentage), *FDFP* (Flat Dollar Amount plus Fixed Percentage).
Max length: 10

homeAddress.description: Add or update employee's home address, personal phone numbers, and personal email.

isHighlyCompensated.description: Indicates if employee meets the highly compensated employee criteria.

isSmoker.description: Indicates if employee is a smoker.

localTax.description: Add, update, or delete local tax code, filing status, and exemptions including  PA-PSD taxes.

filingStatus.description:
Employee local tax filing status. Must match specific local tax setup.
Max length: 50

residentPSD.description:
Resident PSD (political subdivision code) applicable in PA. Must match Company setup.
Max length: 9

workPSD.description:
Work location PSD. Must match Company setup.
Max length: 9

mainDirectDeposit.description: Add the main direct deposit account. After deposits are made to any additional direct deposit accounts, the remaining net check is deposited in the main direct deposit account. IMPORTANT: A direct deposit update will remove ALL existing main and additional direct deposit information in WebPay and replace with what is provided on the request. GET API will not return direct deposit data.

accountNumber.description:
Account number, entered without special characters and spaces.
Max length: 17

accountType.description:
Account type. Valid values are *C* (Checking), *S* (Saving), *P* (Pay Card).
Max length: 1

blockSpecial.description: Indicates if direct deposit should be blocked when special check types such as Bonus are processed.

isSkipPreNote.description: Indicates if account will not pre-note.

nameOnAccount.description:
Name on the bank account. Defaults to employee's name.
Max length: 30

preNoteDate.description: Date to end the pre-note of the account. Common formats include *MM-DD-CCYY*, *CCYY-MM-DD*.

routingNumber.description:
ABA Transit Routing Number, entered without dashes or spaces.
Max length: 9

maritalStatus.description:
Employee marital status. Common values *D (Divorced), M (Married), S (Single), W (Widowed)*.
Max length: 10

nonPrimaryStateTax.description: Add or update non-primary state tax code, amount type (taxCalculationCode), amount or percentage, filing status, exemptions, supplemental check (specialCheckCalc), and reciprocity code information.

deductionsAmount.description:
Box 4(b) on form W4 (year 2020 or later): Deductions amount.
Decimal (12,2)

dependentsAmount.description:
Box 3 on form W4 (year 2020 or later): Total dependents amount.
Decimal (12,2)

filingStatus.description:
Employee state tax filing status. Common values are *S* (Single), *M* (Married).
Max length: 50

higherRate.description:
Box 2(c) on form W4 (year 2020 or later): Multiple Jobs or Spouse Works.
Boolean

otherIncomeAmount.description:
Box 4(a) on form W4 (year 2020 or later): Other income amount.
Decimal (12,2)

reciprocityCode.description:
Non-primary state tax reciprocity code.
Max length: 50

specialCheckCalc.description:
Supplemental check calculation code. Common values are *Blocked* (Taxes blocked on Supplemental checks), *Supp* (Use supplemental Tax Rate-Code).
Max length: 10

taxCalculationCode.description:
Tax calculation code. Common values are *F* (Flat), *P* (Percentage), *FDFP* (Flat Dollar Amount plus Fixed Percentage).
Max length: 10

ownerPercent.description:
Percentage of employee's ownership in the company, entered as a whole number.
Decimal (12,2)

preferredName.description:
Employee preferred display name.
Max length: 20

primaryPayRate.description: Add or update hourly or salary pay rate, effective date, and pay frequency.

baseRate.description:
Employee base rate, used for Hourly employees.
Decimal (12,2)

beginCheckDate.description: The date of the first check on which the new pay rate will appear. This value is only applicable when updating an existing employee. Common formats include *MM-DD-CCYY*, *CCYY-MM-DD*.

changeReason.description:
Pay rate change reason.
Max length: 30

defaultHours.description:
Employee default hours consistently worked. If autoPayType is set to D, employee will be paid hourly base rate for the defaultHours.
Decimal (12,2)

effectiveDate.description: The date the employee's pay rate takes effect. Common formats include *MM-DD-CCYY*, *CCYY-MM-DD*.

isAutoPay.description: If set to *True*, employee will be paid automatically using deafultHours.

payFrequency.description:
Employee current pay frequency. Common values are *A (Annual), B (Bi-Weekly), D (Daily), M (Monthly), S (Semi-Monthly), Q (Quarterly), W (Weekly)*.
Max length: 5

payGrade.description:
Employee pay grade. Must match Company setup.
Max length: 10

payRateNote.description:
Pay rate notes regarding employee.
Max length: 250

payType.description:
Employee pay type (rate code). Valid values are *Hourly* or *Salary*.
Max length: 10

ratePer.description:
Employee base rate frequency used with payType Hourly. Common values are *Hour, Week*. Default is Hour.
Max length: 10

salary.description:
Employee gross salary per pay period used with payType Salary.
Decimal (12,2)

primaryStateTax.description: Add or update primary state tax code, amount type (taxCalculationCode), amount or percentage, filing status, exemptions, and supplemental check (specialCheckCalc) information. Only one primary state is allowed. Sending an updated primary state will replace the current primary state.

deductionsAmount.description:
Box 4(b) on form W4 (year 2020 or later): Deductions amount.
Decimal (12,2)

dependentsAmount.description:
Box 3 on form W4 (year 2020 or later): Total dependents amount.
Decimal (12,2)

isTimeLaborEnabled.description: If set to true, changes to employee data will be reflected in Web Time.

path.description: The JSON path of the field, or property, that contains an error in the request message.

IMPORTANT: A direct deposit update will remove ALL existing main and additional direct deposit information in WebPay and replace with information provided on the request. GET API will not return direct deposit data.

accountType.description:

amount.description:
Amount value to be deposited to the account.

amountType.description:

isSkipPreNote.description: Indicates if account will not pre-note.

preNoteDate.description: Date to end the pre-note of the account. Common formats include *MM-DD-CCYY*, *CCYY-MM-DD*.

routingNumber.description:

benefitSetup.description: Add setup values used for employee benefits integration, insurance plan settings, and ACA reporting.

benefitClass.description:

benefitClassEffectiveDate.description: Date when Benefit Class takes effect. Common formats include *MM-DD-CCYY*, *CCYY-MM-DD*.

benefitSalaryEffectiveDate.description: Date when Benefit Salary takes effect. Common formats include *MM-DD-CCYY*, *CCYY-MM-DD*.

doNotApplyAdministrativePeriod.description: Applicable only for ACA Enhanced clients and Benefit Classes with ACA Employment Type of Full Time.

isMeasureAcaEligibility.description: Only valid for ACA Enhanced clients and Benefit Classes that are ACA Employment Type of Full Time.

customBooleanFields.description: Up to 8 custom fields of boolean (checkbox) type value.

category.description: The custom field category.  Acceptable value is 'PayrollAndHR'.

label.description: The custom field label whose value is to be added/updated. Must match to the label defined in Web Pay Custom Fields setup.  Max length: 255.

customDateFields.description: Up to 8 custom fields of the date type value.

category.description: The custom field category.  Acceptable value is 'PayrollAndHR'.

label.description: The custom field label whose value is to be added/updated.  Must match to the label defined in Web Pay Custom Fields setup.  Max length: 255.

value.description: The custom date field value.  Common formats include MM-DD-CCYY, CCYY-MM-DD.

customDropDownFields.description: Up to 8 custom fields of the dropdown type value.

category.description: The custom field category.  Acceptable value is 'PayrollAndHR'.

label.description: The custom field label whose value is to be added/updated.  Must match to the label defined in Web Pay Custom Fields setup.  Max length: 255.

value.description: The custom dropdown field value.  Values are configured in Web Pay Company > Setup > List Values > Lookup Values > Custom Fields: PayrollAndHR.  Max length: 10.

customNumberFields.description: Up to 8 custom fields of numeric type value.

category.description: The custom field category.  Acceptable value is 'PayrollAndHR'.

label.description: The custom field label whose value is to be added/updated.  Must match to the label defined in Web Pay Custom Fields setup.  Max length: 255.

value.description: The custom number field value.  Decimal (18,6).

customTextFields.description: Up to 8 custom fields of text type value.

category.description: The custom field category.  Acceptable value is 'PayrollAndHR'.

label.description: The custom field label whose value is to be added/updated.  Must match to the label defined in Web Pay Custom Fields setup.  Max length: 255.

value.description: The custom text field value.  Max length: 255.
